title: Bank Negara Malaysia (BNM) Open API Python package
description: Built an unofficial Python wrapper for BNM's Open API
body:
> * My first experience of developing and deploying a Python package into PyPI
> * Utilized the request library in Python to build a simple wrapper to call BNM's Open API

PyPI link: <https://pypi.org/project/openbnmapi/>

Github link: <https://github.com/knazran/python-openbnmapi>
